overview: Xemgin is 6 years old, he is called Pîzotout of school which means very naughty and he is called Hemgin at school which means Xemgin in Turkish. He is silent at school but he is very naughty outside of school as his nickname Pîzot. Three different classes are held in one classroom at his school which is a funny system, and Xemgin doesn't know Turkish and that's why troubles occur.
title: The Tongue of Mountains
